analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_contracts/0xc651e99f40d908b6a606d54f221b414b5228ff60.sol#124) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_contracts/0xc651e99f40d908b6a606d54f221b414b5228ff60.sol#220-249)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_contracts/0xc651e99f40d908b6a606d54f221b414b5228ff60.sol#327-348)
	- generateTokens (/unique_contracts/0xc651e99f40d908b6a606d54f221b414b5228ff60.sol#419-433)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_contracts/0xc651e99f40d908b6a606d54f221b414b5228ff60.sol#436-453)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_contracts/0xc651e99f40d908b6a606d54f221b414b5228ff60.sol#520-524) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_contracts/0xc651e99f40d908b6a606d54f221b414b5228ff60.sol#262-281):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(ITokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount) == true) (/unique_contracts/0xc651e99f40d908b6a606d54f221b414b5228ff60.sol#278-279)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_contracts/0xc651e99f40d908b6a606d54f221b414b5228ff60.sol#280)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_contracts/0xc651e99f40d908b6a606d54f221b414b5228ff60.sol#552-567) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_contracts/0xc651e99f40d908b6a606d54f221b414b5228ff60.sol#564-567)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0xc651e99f40d908b6a606d54f221b414b5228ff60.sol#486) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_contracts/0xc651e99f40d908b6a606d54f221b414b5228ff60.sol#525-530)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_contracts/0xc651e99f40d908b6a606d54f221b414b5228ff60.sol#520-524)
	- /unique_contracts/0xc651e99f40d908b6a606d54f221b414b5228ff60.sol#522-524
MiniMeToken.version should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xc651e99f40d908b6a606d54f221b414b5228ff60.sol#95)
Controlled.changeController (/unique_contracts/0xc651e99f40d908b6a606d54f221b414b5228ff60.sol#70-77) should be declared external
